steps.title: Choose Your Plan

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our platform.

questions.question: Do I need any technical skills to get started?
questions.answer: Not at all! Just pick your plan, send your info via WhatsApp, and we’ll handle everything — from design to delivery.

questions.question: Where will my website be hosted?
questions.answer: Your website will be hosted for free using modern static hosting platforms. No need to pay monthly hosting fees.

questions.question: How will customers place orders?
questions.answer: Each product will have a button that redirects to your WhatsApp with a pre-filled message — simple, fast, and personal.

questions.question: Can I update my products later?
questions.answer: Yes! Just message us on WhatsApp with the new details — we'll handle the updates based on your plan.

questions.question: How long does it take to build the website?
questions.answer: Usually between 2 to 4 days, depending on your plan and how quickly you send the required info.

questions.question: What’s included in each plan?
questions.answer: Each plan includes different features, like the number of products, design customization, and update frequency. You’ll see full details when you choose a plan.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.description: Select the package that best fits your needs. All plans include a free WhatsApp link for easy customer communication.
